course_title: Special Topics in Bioethics: Law & Ethics in Health Care
class_notes: Course Description: This course will provide in-depth examination in health law and bioethics of various instances of legal or moral tension in health care delivery. It will provide students with a theoretical foundation and practical illustrations to prepare them to engage in ethical deliberation and scholarly research related to bioethics and health law.
course_description: Topics and professors for the Bioethics elective change every semester.
schedule_location: TTh 10:30am-12pm in Gambrell Hall- Tull Auditorium
